tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_target_date AS SELECT con.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, val.value_date AS name, con.id AS indicator_connection_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con, amp_indicator_values val WHERE val.ind_connect_id = con.id AND val.value_type = 0 AND con.sub_clazz::text = 'a'::text;
